title: Stats take too long loading
body: Everytime I finish a game, I have to wait 2-3 minutes for my stats to load in. Is there any settings change to this that may help?

replies.body: This can happen if you have [Disable client during match](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled.  It reduces PC stress during a match by closing the client, so it needs a moment to restart once it ends.  Disabling that should speed up the process!
I use to have the same problem then realized I have "Low Spec" enabled in the settings.
